name: Kokopelli
skill: Deals 1246/1526 DMG to all enemies, with a very high chance of inflicting weak poison.
ability: Slightly increases battle reward drop rate.

additional_data.description: A spirit considered to be the god of fertility in certain parts of the world. He is constantly altering the energy levels of the land. Actually, his health affects the production of local crops, so when he's sick it can cause a shortage of food. As a result people are extremely nice to him, and he's gotten kind of spoiled. If he so much as pretends to be sick, people come running with food to him. Apparently a certain goddess noticed this and sent him to the Bureau of the Occult to try to build some strength and endurance.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 16/11/16 - 07/12/16
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 12/04/16 - 07/12/16
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points gained by 25% during the "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" event.
◦ Summon rate increased until 16/11/16 - 07/12/16

skill: "Things don't go well for the stuff I've given up on..."
summon: "I'm really good at pretending to be sick!"
limit_break: "It's too late to turn back now..."
